pullrequest.title: Change train_windows (in minibatch) to sort in reverse, such that the last index will not be greater than 9999

content.raw: Just wanted to update that it looks like the GMTK tracker has silently thrown my ticket away (I didn't get any email notification or anything), as it doesn't show up either under 'My Ticket' or 'Active Tickets' or any of the other categories.
content.html: Just wanted to update that it looks like the GMTK tracker has silently thrown my ticket away (I didn't get any email notification or anything), as it doesn't show up either under 'My Ticket' or 'Active Tickets' or any of the other categories.
